description: This file defines an interface class 'IEventHandler' within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, which provides callback methods for container lifecycle events such as start, stop, failure, and state change, each accepting a JSON object as data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling container lifecycle events, allowing implementations to respond to container start, stop, failure, and state change events.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container is started, providing event data.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container is stopped, providing event data.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, providing event data.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked on changes in container state, providing event data.
